Consent of a parent may include a waiver of rights to notice of:
the filing of a petition under this subtitle; and
further proceedings under this subtitle.
Subject to subparagraph (ii) of this paragraph, a parent may revoke consent at any time within 30 days after the parent signs the consent.
A parent may not revoke consent for adoption of a prospective adoptee if:
A prospective adoptee may revoke consent at any time before a court enters an order of adoption under this subtitle.
